    net.minecraftforge.client.model

    • net.minecraftforge.client.model中Fluid的使用

      参数类型为Fluid的net.minecraftforge.client.model中的构造器 
      构造器 说明

      已过时。
      use ModelDynBucket(ResourceLocation, ResourceLocation, ResourceLocation, Fluid, boolean, boolean)
      ModelDynBucket​(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation baseLocation, net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation liquidLocation, net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation coverLocation, Fluid fluid, boolean flipGas, boolean tint)  
      ModelFluid​(Fluid fluid)

      返回变量类型为Fluid的类型的net.minecraftforge.fluids中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static java.util.Set<Fluid> FluidRegistry.getBucketFluids()
      All fluids registered with the universal bucket
      static java.util.Map<Fluid,java.lang.Integer> FluidRegistry.getRegisteredFluidIDs()
      已过时。
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Fluid> FluidRegistry.getRegisteredFluids()
      Returns a read-only map containing Fluid Names and their associated Fluids.
      参数类型为Fluid的net.minecraftforge.fluids中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static boolean FluidRegistry.addBucketForFluid​(Fluid fluid)
      Registers a fluid with the universal bucket.
      static java.lang.String FluidRegistry.getDefaultFluidName​(Fluid key)  
      static net.minecraft.item.ItemStack UniversalBucket.getFilledBucket​(UniversalBucket item, Fluid fluid)
      已过时。
      use the NBT-sensitive version FluidUtil.getFilledBucket(FluidStack)
      static java.lang.String FluidRegistry.getFluidName​(Fluid fluid)  
      static boolean FluidRegistry.hasBucket​(Fluid fluid)  
      static boolean FluidRegistry.isFluidDefault​(Fluid fluid)
      Is the supplied fluid the current default fluid for it's name
      static boolean FluidRegistry.isFluidRegistered​(Fluid fluid)
      Does the supplied fluid have an entry for it's name (whether or not the fluid itself is default)
      static boolean FluidRegistry.registerFluid​(Fluid fluid)
      Register a new Fluid.
      类型变量类型为Fluid的net.minecraftforge.fluids中的方法参数 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void FluidRegistry.initFluidIDs​(com.google.common.collect.BiMap<Fluid,java.lang.Integer> newfluidIDs, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> defaultNames)
      Called by Forge to prepare the ID map for server -> client sync.
      参数类型为Fluid的net.minecraftforge.fluids中的构造器 
      构造器 说明
      BlockFluidBase​(Fluid fluid, net.minecraft.block.material.Material material)

      BlockFluidClassic​(Fluid fluid, net.minecraft.block.material.Material material, net.minecraft.block.material.MapColor mapColor)  
      BlockFluidFinite​(Fluid fluid, net.minecraft.block.material.Material material)  
      BlockFluidFinite​(Fluid fluid, net.minecraft.block.material.Material material, net.minecraft.block.material.MapColor mapColor)
